PageTitle: mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel (MPLS view)
FuncDef:
The mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel command enables BFD for TE LSP globally for a primary tunnel that is automatically established.
The undo mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel command restores the default path calculation function.
By default, BFD for TE LSP is disabled globally for a primary tunnel that is automatically established.
CLIs: mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel { pce-initiated-lsp | segment-routing }
undo mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel { pce-initiated-lsp | segment-routing }
Examples: [*HUAWEI-mpls] mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel segment-routing
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
PCEP can trigger the establishment of RSVP-TE and SR-MPLS TE LSPs:
To enable BFD for RSVP-TE LSPs, run the mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel pce-initiated-lsp command.To enable BFD for SR-MPLS TE LSPs, run the mpls te bfd enable auto-primary-tunnel segment-routing command.
